channel.title: [Pi] NPCHandler // NPC [Pi]

item.title: [Pi] NPCHandler // NPC [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hey guys, I am adding different attack animations for NPC’s at different points in the fight but it isn’t working. I have this in my NPCHandler

And I have the forceAnim void in NPC.java

public void forceAnim(int number) { animNumber = number; animUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; }

But in NPCHandler it says that it cannot find the forceAnim void in NPC.java or that it is set up wrong. I don’t think I set it up wrong but maybe I did. What can I do to fix this? I have all of the necessary things in NPC to make the forceAnim void work.

Read full topic
